query:
SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(p.id) as product_count 
FROM categories c 
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId 
WHERE c.name LIKE '%Falafel%' 
GROUP BY c.id, c.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 22Rpum9L9sZxinw.3c3b08241dc8 --database co5PUNqXK8tudZyuUEyQHS --execute SELECT c.id, c.name, COUNT(p.id) as product_count 
FROM categories c 
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId 
WHERE c.name LIKE '%Falafel%' 
GROUP BY c.id, c.name;
